column1: Little Goat Diner////Had a very interesting meal here at the little goat diner. They have very interesting dishes
column2: some of which you probably won't find most anywhere. I myself had the onoryamikai (or something like that) it was a scallion pancake
column7: and some bonito flakes. It was a very nice combination of flavors and textures. My only complaint with the dish
column8: was the Bonita flakes. They were a strange texture
column10: really overpowered the flavor. My sister had the to tonkatsu sandwich
column11: which was really nice. Had a strong Korean flavor
